website_summaries.verdict: You can't go wrong with these simple but delicious wedding mints.
pros: A simple party favor that everyone can enjoy
“Two Hearts, One Love” message on each wrapper
Sits at a decent price point
Expiry date is well ahead of shipping date
cons: Occasionally one or two wrappers are empty

customer_reviews.title: These buttermints are tasty and i bought them from Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.text: i have always liked these buttermints wedding candies. Here is a video. i hope it's helpful. Sabiene :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabiene :)

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews saying that the expiration date was too close to the day of delivery. I wanted to leave a review to give my experience with the date. I was a little hesitant to order these based off the reviews due to the fact that I didn’t need the mints until the middle of July but am preparing favor bags ahead of time, which is what these are being used for. The expiration date on my pack of mints is not until November of this year, which is plenty of time.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best by date is too soon after delivery date
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our daughter's May 2018 wedding. My wife is putting together the favor bags now so as to have time to work on other wedding preparations later. Up until now, that has not been a problem because we have been buying candies with best by dates in August 2018 or later. I received the order for these mints today, on January 09, 2018. The "Best By Date" on the product is only two months out from the day it was delivered. There is a March 2018 date on the bag. I am hoping these mints will not taste stale for our guests.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Radick

customer_reviews.title: Delicious -- Mint Flavor is Subdued -- LOVED THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: These were not only good but delicious. Very buttery and less mint taste. Little girls at our bridal shower loved them and couldn't stop eating them! Ordered another brand for the wedding and the taste was more minty. I liked these best! Delicious!! High quality and very nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Mills

customer_reviews.title: Don't exactly melt in your mouth
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packed, and individual little wrapped mint pieces were lovely, as well. We sprinkled them on the tables at a bridal shower, after dinner and dessert. Although they were hard, more like the consistency of mint life savers than buttermints, the guests didn't seem to mind. Maybe they were stale? No one cared. It pays to serve wine and mixed drinks I guess. By the time the buttermints are put out, who really does care? They looked pretty on the tables~ :~)
customer_reviews.author: PJ DeAngelis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I don't even like mints and thought they were delicious.
customer_reviews.text: They look cute, taste great, arrived on Feb. 2nd and don't expire until June. I'm impressed, and will be very happy to use at my wedding. 108 pieces is actually a smaller bag than anticipated, so note how many pieces you need if you're filling a jar or something for each guest. I ordered 3 bags to fill cupcake size small box and will probably need to order at least 2 more bags for only 24 boxes. But the boxes are 4" x 4", rather large for typical favor.
customer_reviews.author: WorldTraveler

customer_reviews.title: ... for my wedding or theme was two hearts one love. They match the theme perfectly and didn't taste ...
customer_reviews.text: Are used these meant for my wedding or theme was two hearts one love. They match the theme perfectly and didn't taste too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Family and home

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was fast an was rreceived in good condition. Only reason why I am not giving ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my wedding.. The shipping was fast an was rreceived in good condition. Only reason why I am not giving it 5 stars is because some of the packets were empty.. Other than that its perfect for a wedding!
customer_reviews.author: S.bal

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well
customer_reviews.text: These looked so pretty on the tables. They also taste good. I had no trouble with an early expiration date as some people seem to have reported. I didn't order these until a couple weeks before the wedding as Amazon has quick shipping times.
customer_reviews.author: S. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Buttercreme Mints from the bride and groom!
customer_reviews.text: They were presented in just a regular plastic bag that had about half emptied out and strapping tape was wrapped around the bag. From a retail point of view, presentation was not acceptable!
customer_reviews.author: blabr.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Size
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I ordered them for my daughter's bridal shower to place all over the tables for everyone to enjoy. The packaging is so cute. I ordered them to compliment the intertwined hearts cups and napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for the wedding theme, had more than enough and were perfect. Came earlier than expected which was awesome being as though we ordered so last minute. Some ppl ate them some took them home, either way everyone was happy
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Griff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: shipped quickly, was just what I was looking for the party. Have some left over and love the taste. Thanks for your product!!️ Saved me a lot of time trying to go shopping here in town which could not find anywhere!!️
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Two hearts buttermint
customer_reviews.text: It’s not right one I just had a reorder and it’s not it damn it. My daughter getting married so! Now I can’t return it. It’s not my fault! I don’t want it. I want the right one as the pictures
customer_reviews.author: JennyLyn O.

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. The taste was good but they seemed kind of stale and sticks to your teeth. I am still happy with the purchase but I probably wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It's the little things... a nice touch..
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple little thing can add so much charm. We put these mints in the little gift boxes for our wedding guests, along with some custom wrapped chocolates and little bubble blowers, with some crinkle cut paper shreds to spruce it up. The little woman is very very happy. And, so... so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Buttermints
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pre-printed packaging that was perfect for a little something at the end of the buffet table. You can rarely go wrong with butter mints.
customer_reviews.author: Windy B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice touch for snack bowls.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing two bags because the first bag had so many eaten out of it before the wedding. Good quality mint with nice individual packaging. Best price per unit we could find.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Hearts
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for my wedding and they where really cute. It was perfect for my two hearts theme. The mints tastes good. No regrets.

customer_reviews.title: Great for weddings
customer_reviews.text: We put them in our wedding favor bags for our guests...they are very good. The special message is a nice touch.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and quantity

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy

They were fresh and delicious like the first day I got them and everyone love them and enjoy !!!

product_meta.title: Two Hearts Buttermints Wedding Candy (108 Pieces) 14 oz.
product_meta.description: Fill a candy dish with these lovely Two Hearts buttermints for a sweet treat at your wedding reception. Place mints at each place setting, add them to the dessert table or place buttermints in favor bags. Wrappers read "Two Hearts, One Love". Mint flavor. Individually wrapped. (108 pcs per unit) Total wt, 14 oz. Gluten-free. Kosher (Dairy). Made in the USA, Nut-free.
feature_bullets: Fill a candy dish with these lovely Two Hearts buttermints for a sweet treat at your wedding reception. Place mints at each place setting, add them to the dessert table or place buttermints in favor bags.
108 pcs per unit) Total wt, 14 oz.
Individually wrapped. (Gluten-free. Kosher (Dairy). Made in the USA,
